title: Vivid Pulp
description: Un style visuel percutant caractérisé par un fond de couleur unie plat et hyper-saturé (généralement rouge vif) contrastant nettement avec un sujet au premier plan au rendu hyper-réaliste. L'esthétique mêle art conceptuel numérique moderne et dynamique d'affiche de propagande, utilisant des perspectives spectaculaires en contre-plongée, un éclairage directionnel dur et des détails de texture intenses comme la sueur et le grain pour transmettre agression et urgence.
description_en: A high-impact visual style characterized by a flat, hyper-saturated solid color background (typically vivid red) contrasting sharply with a hyper-realistically rendered foreground subject. The aesthetic blends modern digital concept art with propaganda poster dynamics, utilizing dramatic low-angle perspectives, harsh directional lighting, and intense textural details like sweat, pores, and grit to convey aggression and urgency.
description_fr: Un style visuel percutant caractérisé par un fond de couleur unie plat et hyper-saturé (généralement rouge vif) contrastant nettement avec un sujet au premier plan au rendu hyper-réaliste. L'esthétique mêle art conceptuel numérique moderne et dynamique d'affiche de propagande, utilisant des perspectives spectaculaires en contre-plongée, un éclairage directionnel dur et des détails de texture intenses comme la sueur et le grain pour transmettre agression et urgence.
prompt: A striking, high-octane digital illustration of {{subject}} executed in a hyper-stylized propaganda poster aesthetic. The image features a stark, completely flat, featureless background of intense, hyper-saturated {{primary_color}} that occupies the entire negative space, creating a razor-sharp vector-like silhouette separation from the foreground. The {{subject}} is rendered with extreme hyper-realism and three-dimensional volume, contrasting aggressively with the 2D background. Use a dramatic low-angle perspective (worm's-eye view), looking up at the {{subject}} to emphasize dominance, power, and scale. The lighting is cinematic and harsh, with strong key lighting creating deep, crushed black shadows and brilliant specular highlights. Pay obsessive attention to surface textures: glistening sweat on skin, microscopic pores, gritty fabric weaves, and realistic reflections on metal or glass elements. The color palette is strictly dual-tone: the overwhelming {{primary_color}} void versus the naturalistic but high-contrast tones of the {{subject}}, with deep blacks and bright highlights. There are no gradients in the background; it is a solid matte field of color. The composition is tight and confrontational, with the {{subject}} often shouting, running, or posing dynamically. The image must be full bleed, extending to every corner with absolutely no borders, frames, or margins. The style evokes a blend of modern hip-hop album covers, Soviet constructivist posters, and high-end 3D character concept art. {{lighting}}, {{mood}}.

background_prompt: A minimalist, abstract environment composed of a vast, infinite field of hyper-saturated {{primary_color}}. The scene is characterized by its stark flatness and lack of texture, resembling a seamless studio cyclorama or a pristine vector canvas. While the dominant field is a solid matte hue, subtle, sharp geometric cast shadows in deep {{accent_color}} stretch across the floor or wall, suggesting a harsh, unseen light source from a low angle. The atmosphere is oppressive, bold, and graphic, evoking the empty negative space of a propaganda poster or a high-contrast pop-art print. No objects, no figures, just the intense interplay of the solid color field and stark shadow shapes.
